name: Tartle's Tale of Wheezing Gloop
description:
A short game made for Fishing Jam 2016.

I used character art and story ideas from my app for tabletop RPGs called the Tartle RPG Tool. 

This game is kind of a joke based on the idea of, what if you unexpectedly hit the Game Over screen 20 seconds in no matter what you did? So, yeah, now this is a thing. It's dumb, but maybe you'll get a laugh out of it.
